statements: SELECT item_id, item_name, condition, location FROM returned_items WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT item_id, item_name, condition FROM returned_items WHERE condition = 'Damaged';
SELECT * FROM returned_items WHERE location = 'Warehouse' ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, location FROM returned_items WHERE item_id BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM returned_items WHERE condition = 'Good' AND location = 'Retail Store';
SELECT * FROM returned_items WHERE condition='used';
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM returned_items WHERE item_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM returned_items WHERE location LIKE '%New York%' AND condition='new' ORDER BY item_id ASC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, location FROM returned_items WHERE location='Warehouse A' OR location='Warehouse B';
SELECT item_id, item_name, condition FROM returned_items WHERE condition='damaged' OR condition='refurbished' ORDER BY item_name;

SELECT condition, location FROM returned_items;
SELECT item_id, location FROM returned_items WHERE condition = 'Good';

SELECT destination_name, location FROM destinations WHERE destination_id = 2;

SELECT destination_name, location FROM destinations WHERE destination_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM returned_items WHERE condition='poor' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT destination_name, location FROM destinations WHERE location='Paris' ORDER BY destination_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM returned_items ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, condition FROM returned_items WHERE condition = 'good';
SELECT location FROM returned_items WHERE condition = 'damaged';
SELECT destination_name FROM destinations WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM routing_rules WHERE source_location = 'Warehouse' AND condition = 'priority';
SELECT * FROM returned_items WHERE condition = 'Damaged' ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, location FROM returned_items WHERE location LIKE '%Warehouse%' AND condition != 'Lost';
SELECT destination_name, location FROM destinations JOIN routing_rules ON destinations.id = routing_rules.destination_id WHERE routing_rules.condition = 'Priority';
SELECT * FROM returned_items JOIN destinations ON returned_items.location = destinations.location WHERE destinations.destination_name = 'Warehouse 1';
SELECT item_name, COUNT(*) AS total FROM returned_items GROUP BY item_name ORDER BY total DESC;
SELECT * FROM returned_items;
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM returned_items WHERE condition='good';
SELECT destination_name, destination_address FROM destinations ORDER BY destination_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, return_location FROM returned_items WHERE item_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT item_id, rule_id, timestamp FROM routing_log WHERE rule_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM returned_items;
SELECT item_name, condition FROM returned_items WHERE condition = 'good';
SELECT * FROM destinations ORDER BY destination_name DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, condition, destination_name FROM returned_items INNER JOIN routing_log ON returned_items.item_id = routing_log.item_id;
SELECT DISTINCT destination_name, destination_address, destination_contact FROM destinations INNER JOIN routing_rules ON destinations.destination_id = routing_rules.destination_id;
SELECT * FROM returned_items;
SELECT item_name, condition FROM returned_items WHERE condition='good';
SELECT destination_id, destination_name, address FROM destinations ORDER BY destination_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM routing_rules WHERE condition_check='priority' AND destination_id=1;
SELECT factor_id, factor_name FROM condition_factors;
SELECT * FROM returned_items WHERE condition = 'Good' ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, condition FROM returned_items WHERE item_id > 5 AND location = 'Warehouse' ORDER BY item_name ASC;

SELECT item_name, condition, destination_name FROM returned_items JOIN routing_rules ON returned_items.item_id = routing_rules.rule_id JOIN destinations ON routing_rules.destination_id = destinations.destination_id WHERE routing_rules.condition_check = 'Priority';
SELECT item_name, location_name FROM returned_items JOIN location_mapping ON returned_items.location = location_mapping.location_name WHERE item_name LIKE 'Headset%' AND location_name LIKE 'Office%';
SELECT MAX(item_id) AS max_id, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items FROM returned_items WHERE condition = 'Damaged' GROUP BY condition;
